anya-e0105n26:1: Ko so vimuttimaggo nāma? Visuddhimaggo viya sīlasamādhipaññānaṁ visuṁ visuṁ vibhajitvā dīpako eko paṭipattigantho. Tattha hi –
anya-e0105n26:2: ‘‘Sīlaṁ samādhi paññā ca, vimutti ca anuttarā;
anya-e0105n26:3: Anubuddhā ime dhammā, gotamena yasassinā’’ti dī. ni. 2.186; a. ni. 4.1 –
anya-e0105n26:4_0: Imaṁ gāthaṁ paṭhamaṁ dassetvā tadatthavaṇṇanāvasena sīlasamādhipaññāvimuttiyo visuṁ
anya-e0105n26:4_1: visuṁ vibhajitvā dīpitā. So pana gantho idāni cinaraṭṭheyeva diṭṭho, cinabhāsāya
anya-e0105n26:4_2: ca parivattito (1048-bu-va) saṅghapālena nāma bhikkhunā. Kena pana so kuto ca tattha
anya-e0105n26:4_3: ānītoti na pākaṭametaṁ. Tassa pana saṅghapālassa ācariyo guṇabhadro nāma mahāyāniko
anya-e0105n26:4_4: bhikkhu majjhimaindiyadesiko, so indiyaraṭṭhato cinaraṭṭhaṁ gacchanto paṭhamaṁ sīhaḷadīpaṁ
anya-e0105n26:4_5: gantvā tato (978-bu-va) cinaraṭṭhaṁ gato. Tadā so tena ānīto bhaveyya vimuttimagga, visuddhimagga.
anya-e0105n26:5_0: Tasmiñhi vimuttimagge pubbāciṇṇanidānadassanaṁ dhātunidānadassanañca yatheva visuddhimagge
anya-e0105n26:5_1: ekaccevādo, tathevāgataṁ. Dosanidānadassane pana ‘‘semhādhiko rāgacarito, pittādhiko
anya-e0105n26:5_2: dosacarito, vātādhiko mohacarito. Semhādhiko vā mohacarito, vātādhiko rāgacarito’’ti
anya-e0105n26:5_3: tiṇṇampi rāgadosamohānaṁ dosaniyamo vutto. Ācariyabuddhaghosena diṭṭhavimuttimaggapotthake
anya-e0105n26:6: Aññānipi bahūni visuddhimagge paṭikkhittāni tattha vimuttimagge gahetabbabhāvena dissanti. Kathaṁ?
anya-e0105n26:7: Sīlaniddese (1, 8-piṭṭhe) ‘‘aññe pana siraṭṭho sīlattho, sītalattho sīlatthoti evamādināpi nayenettha atthaṁ vaṇṇayantī’’ti paṭikkhitto atthopi tattha gahetabbabhāvena dissati.
anya-e0105n26:8_1: atthato dhutaṅgameva natthi, asantaṁ kassa dhunanato dhutaṅgaṁ nāma bhavissati, dhutaguṇe
anya-e0105n26:8_2: samādāya vattatīti vacanavirodhopi ca nesaṁ āpajjati, tasmā taṁ na gahetabba’’nti
anya-e0105n26:8_3: paṭikkhittaṁ paññattidhutaṅgampi tattha dissati. Mahāṭīkāyaṁ (1-104) pana ‘‘yesanti
anya-e0105n26:8_4: abhayagirivāsike sandhāyāha, te hi dhutaṅgaṁ nāma paññattīti vadantī’’ti vaṇṇitaṁ.
anya-e0105n26:9_1: upekkhānubrūhanā nāma appanā, sampahaṁsanā nāma paccavekkhaṇāti evameke vaṇṇayantī’’tiādinā
anya-e0105n26:9_2: paṭikkhittaekevādopi tattha dissati. Mahāṭīkāyaṁ (1, 172) pana ‘‘eketi abhayagirivāsino’’ti vaṇṇitaṁ.
anya-e0105n26:10_1: ekaccānaṁ matena middharūpa’’nti evaṁ aññānipi rūpāni āharitvā porāṇaṭṭhakathāyaṁ
anya-e0105n26:10_3: vaṇṇitaṁ. Tesu jātirūpaṁ middharūpañca vimuttimagge dassitaṁ. Na kevalaṁ dassanamattameva,
anya-e0105n26:10_4: atha kho middharūpassa atthibhāvopi ‘‘middhaṁ nāma tividhaṁ āhārajaṁ utujaṁ cittajañcāti.
anya-e0105n26:10_5: Tesu cittajameva nīvaraṇaṁ hoti, sesā pana dve arahatopi bhaveyyu’’ntiādinā sādhito.
anya-e0105n26:11_0: Ettāvatā ca vimuttimagge visuddhimaggena asamānatthānaṁ vuttabhāvo ca abhayagirivāsīhi
anya-e0105n26:11_1: tassa ganthassa paṭiggahitabhāvo ca sakkā ñātuṁ. Aññānipi pana īdisāni asamānavacanāni
anya-e0105n26:11_2: bahūni tattha saṁvijjantiyeva, tāni pana sabbāni na sakkā idha dassetuṁ.
anya-e0105n26:12_0: Yebhuyyena panassa karaṇappakāro visuddhimaggassa viya hoti. Yā yā hi pāḷi abhidhammavibhaṅgato
anya-e0105n26:12_1: vā paṭisambhidāmaggato vā aññasuttantehi vā ānetvā sādhakabhāvena visuddhimagge dassiyati,
anya-e0105n26:12_2: tatthapi sā sā pāḷi yebhuyyena dissateva. Tāsu kañcimattaṁ uddharitvā anuminanatthāya dassayissāma.
anya-e0105n26:13: Yā visuddhimagge (1, 47-piṭṭhe) ‘‘pañca sīlāni pāṇātipātassa pahānaṁ sīla’’ntiādikā paṭisambhidāmaggapāḷi dassitā, sā vimuttimaggepi dissateva.
anya-e0105n26:14_1: vicikicchāyā’’ti vacanaṁ peṭake vuttanti dassitaṁ, tañca tatthapi tatheva dassetvā
anya-e0105n26:14_2: ‘‘tipeṭake vutta’’nti niddiṭṭhaṁ. Tipeṭaketi nāmañca peṭakopadesameva sandhāya vuttaṁ
anya-e0105n26:14_3: bhaveyya. Tattha hi vivicceva kāmehīti pāṭhasaṁvaṇṇanāyaṁ ‘‘alobhassa pāripūriyā
anya-e0105n26:14_4: kāmehi viveko sampajjati, adosassa. Amohassa pāripūriyā akusalehi dhammehi viveko
anya-e0105n26:14_5: sampajjatī’’ti pāṭhassa tipeṭake vuttabhāvo dassito. So ca pāṭho peṭakopadese (262-piṭṭhe)
anya-e0105n26:14_6: ‘‘tattha alobhassa pāripūriyā vivitto hoti kāmehī’’tiādinā dissati.
anya-e0105n26:15: Yathā ca visuddhimagge (1, 258-piṭṭhe) ‘‘ayampi kho bhikkhave ānāpānassatisamādhi bhāvito’’tiādikā pāḷi mahāvaggasaṁyuttakato ānetvā dassitā, tatheva tatthapi.
anya-e0105n26:16_1: pāḷi ca (1, 273-piṭṭhe) kakacūpamapāḷi ca paṭisambhidāmaggato ānetvā dassitā, tatheva tatthapi.
anya-e0105n26:17_0: Yathā ca visuddhimagge (2, 69-piṭṭhe) ‘‘katamā cintāmayā paññā’’tiādikā ca pāḷi ‘‘tattha
anya-e0105n26:17_1: katamaṁ āyakosalla’’ntiādikā ca pāḷi (2, 71-piṭṭhe) ‘‘dukkhe ñāṇaṁ atthapaṭisambhidā’’tiādikā
anya-e0105n26:17_2: ca pāḷi abhidhammavibhaṅgato ānetvā dassitā, tatheva tatthapi. Sabbāpi ca tattha
anya-e0105n26:17_3: vuttā ekavidhaduvidhādipaññāpabhedakathā visuddhimagge vuttakathāya yebhuyyena samānāyeva.
anya-e0105n26:19: Parittaṁ sukhumaṁ etaṁ, ūkāsirasamūpama’’nti visuddhi. 2.436; dha. sa. aṭṭha. 596 –
anya-e0105n26:20_0: Ayampi gāthā vimuttimaggepi āyasmatā sāriputtattherena bhāsitabhāveneva dassitā.
anya-e0105n26:20_1: Ūkāsirasamūpamanti padaṁ pana ūkāsamūpamanti tattha dissati, tañca paramparalekhakānaṁ
anya-e0105n26:21_0: Catūsu saccesu visuddhimagge viya vacanatthato lakkhaṇato anūnādhikato kamato antogadhānaṁ
anya-e0105n26:21_1: pabhedato upamāto ca vinicchayo dassito, so ca yebhuyyena visuddhimaggena visuddhi. 2.530 samānoyeva.
anya-e0105n26:22_0: Yathā ca visuddhimagge (2, 242-245) sammasanañāṇakathāyaṁ pañcannaṁ khandhānaṁ atītādiekādasavidhena
anya-e0105n26:22_1: ca aniccādilakkhaṇattayena ca visuṁ visuṁ sammasananayo dassito, tatheva tatthapi.
anya-e0105n26:22_2: Cakkhādijarāmaraṇapariyosānesu pana dhammesu dhammavicārapariyosānānaṁ saṭṭhiyā eva
anya-e0105n26:23_1: ubho bhijjanti paccayā’’ti gāthā ca, ‘‘na cakkhuto jāyare’’tiādikā cha gāthāyo ca,
anya-e0105n26:23_2: ‘‘na sakena balena jāyare’’tiādikā cha gāthāyo ca vimuttimagge bhaṅgānupassanāñāṇakathāyaṁ
anya-e0105n26:24: Visuddhimagge (2, 261-2-piṭṭhesu) arūpasattakesu ariyavaṁsakathānayena vutto kalāpato ca yamakato ca sammasananayo vimuttimagge ettheva bhaṅgānupassanāñāṇakathāyaṁ dassito.
anya-e0105n26:25: Vimuttimagge buddhānussatikathāyaṁ lokavidūti padassa atthavaṇṇanāyaṁ sattalokasaṅkhāralokavasena dveyeva lokā dassitā, na pana okāsaloko yathā visuddhimagge (1, 199-200-piṭṭhesu).
anya-e0105n26:26_0: Ettāvatā ca vimuttimaggo nāma gantho kīdisoti sakkā anuminituṁ. So pana yathā na
anya-e0105n26:26_1: mahāvihāravāsīnaṁ gantho hoti, evaṁ mahāyānikānampi na hotiyeva theravādapiṭakameva
anya-e0105n26:26_2: nissāya katabhāvato. Yasmā pana tattha na kiñcipi sīhaḷadīpikaṁ nāmaṁ vā theravādo
anya-e0105n26:26_3: vā dissati, tasmā so sīhaḷadīpe kataganthopi na hoti. Indiyaraṭṭhikaṁ pana nāmañca
anya-e0105n26:26_4: vohāro ca tattha bahūsu ṭhānesu dissati, tasmā indiyaraṭṭhe kataganthova bhaveyya.
anya-e0105n26:26_5: Yasmā cassa peṭakopadesaṁ nissitabhāvo bahūsu ṭhānesu dissati, visesato pana middharūpassa
anya-e0105n26:26_6: atthibhāvo ca, arahatopi tassa atthibhāvo ca tameva nissāya dassīyati, paṭisambhidāmaggagaṇṭhipade
anya-e0105n26:26_7: ca peṭaketi padassa paṭi. ma. aṭṭha. 1.1.36 atthavaṇṇanāyaṁ ‘‘suttantapiṭakatthāya
anya-e0105n26:26_8: aṭṭhakathā peṭakaṁ mahisāsakānaṁ gantho’’ti vaṇṇito. Tasmā eso vimuttimaggo mahisāsakanikāyikena
